object_bookcase.name: Old dirty bookcase
object_bookcase.description: It seems the warden was quite the reader, it looks like there is something missing from the bookcase though.

object_chair.name: Chair
object_chair.description: Just and old wooden chair, I sat there once then I got hit by something on my head

object_flowerpot.name: Flower pot
object_flowerpot.description: Looks like the warden let everything die even his flowers

object_dirty_old_weaponrack.name: dirty old weaponrack
object_dirty_old_weaponrack.description: An out of service weapon rack, still has some old weapons I see.

object_dead_child.name: Dead child
object_dead_child.description: Not even a child was spared, Who could be responsible for such a tragedy?

object_dead_goblin01.name: Dead Goblin
object_dead_goblin01.description: A dead goblin? These guards were attacked by goblins, why on earth would they leave their mines.

object_dead_goblin02.name: Dead Goblin
object_dead_goblin02.description: This one had a bagpack with him, I should check it out maybe I can find something useful.

object_dead_guard02.name: Dead guard(1)
object_dead_guard02.description: An arrow in the back. Looks like they got ambushed.

object_dead_guard03.name: Dead guard(2)
object_dead_guard03.description: Another one with an arrow in the back, they never stood a chance.

object_dead_guard04.name: Dead guard(3)
object_dead_guard04.description: They messed this one up really good, seems like he put up quite the fight

object_dead_gardener.name: Dead gardener
object_dead_gardener.description: At least the old man took one with him. Wait. He's wearing the royal sign on his chest he must have been an old guard or something. I wonder if he left something behind.

object_shed.name: Gardeners shed
object_shed.description: A small gardening shed, there are quite some of dozens spread over the gardens. Maybe I can find something to aid me here.

object_berry_bush.name: Frostberry bush
object_berry_bush.description: One of the rare treasures this garden has to offer, these berries are known for their restorative powers.

object_dead_goblin_brawler01.name: Dead goblin brawler(1)
object_dead_goblin_brawler01.description: One of the toughest kind of goblins out there.

object_dead_goblin_brawler02.name: Dead goblin brawler(2)
object_dead_goblin_brawler02.description: These were defending the castle against possible intruders, I should search them.

object_long_wooden_table.name: Long wooden table
object_long_wooden_table.description: A long wooden table where guards off duty eat.

object_cabinet.name: Cabinet
object_cabinet.description: A wooden cabinet, most likely used to store food

object_flowers.name: Flowers
object_flowers.description: Some freshly picked flowers to brigthen up the room.

object_dead_captain_guard.name: Dead Captain of the guard
object_dead_captain_guard.description: Seems like the captain was no match for them either.

object_painting_of_the_fat_lady.name: Painting of the fat lady
object_painting_of_the_fat_lady.description: After the Fat Lady died, a painting depicting her was hung at the castle. She was well known for her indulgence in good food and drink, as well as a passion for 'tip-top security'

object_iron_knight.name: Iron knight
object_iron_knight.description: An iron knight standing guard, there's probably no one inside the armor.

object_magical_chest.name: Magical chest
object_magical_chest.description: A chest with runes engraved,there must be something valueable in this.

object_painting_of_drunken_monks.name: Painting of four druken monks
object_painting_of_drunken_monks.description: Seems like there having a better time then I am at the moment.

object_dead_servant01.name: Dead servant
object_dead_servant01.description: He just got caught in the crossfire.

object_dead_servant02.name: Dead servant(1)
object_dead_servant02.description: Wrong place at the wrong time.
